features.featureTitle: Modify the SnowfallBackground component's drawSnowflake function to render snowflakes in red tones instead of white/blue by changing the radial gradient color stops from white (rgba(255, 255, 255, ...)) and light blue (rgba(240, 245, 255, ...)) to red values (e.g., rgba(255, 0, 0, ...) for the center and rgba(255, 100, 100, ...) for the outer glow)
